summary.text: Highly motivated to achieve the goals, expectation set by the project.
Motivated in taking responsibility in handling, delivering modules/work on time.
Capable on working with cross-functional, collaborating with peers throughout development life cycle of a project.
Capable of adopting/handling different domain projects (worked on education, health, electrical, media sectors projects).
Keen on learning new libraries, frameworks, design patters & implement it on projects.
Good at writing maintainable, scalable, efficient code, problem solving techniques.
Capable of handling multi tasking via multiple projects as & when required.
Capable of creating wire-frames & interrelate it with project requirements, with limited tools availability as being web developer.
